post.title: freesat hd
post.content: hi guys i have sky linked thru my onkyo r608 and then from onkyo into my 50vt30. whenever i turn my tv on it says no channels found which doesn't bother me because i just use sky thru hdmi. however i wouldn't mind setting up freesat hd and freeview hd how do i go about setting it up. what cables need to go where. thanks
